source.cd30e1c0: # PFIZER TWEETS - EDA, VISUALIZATION AND CLEANING
source.33dbaf0b: I'm keeping it restricted to the top 5 because the location data is not exactly very accurate(some are not even locations!)
source.d21fcdee: One of my favorite tasks is data visualization, making colorful plots to uncover the data relationships. Visualization also gets across the data more easily than just plain text.
source.cd50fe7b: There are many tweets without any hashtags. Another interesting relationship I'm looking forward to explore is between the 'user_verified' and 'hashtags', in particular whether non verified profiles tend to use a higher number of hashtags in their tweets.
source.2647b9e3: The only pattern I can spot here is that vaccine tweets fell around 25th Dec-1st Jan during festivities, but again picked up as people started resuming their lives. If you can spot anything else mention it in the comments!
source.6503581f: Let me know what areas I could have improved in! I know I barely scratched the surface in this kernel. I hope to follow up with a kernel on cleaning the text and then running sentiment analysis models on it.
source.fa3d790e: The hastag worldcloud does offer us a glimpse into a few other events going on at the time of the Pfizer launch.
